title: Raydium Pool
subtitle: APR and Liquidity analytics for the NOS-USDC pool

tooltips.apr: Annualized percentage return reported by Raydium for NOS-USDC.
tooltips.liquidity: Depth of the NOS-USDC pool (approximate TVL) based on Raydium data.
tooltips.change: Net change over the selected range for APR and Liquidity.
tooltips.aprRange: Observed minimum and maximum APR within the selected range.
tooltips.liquidityRange: Observed minimum and maximum liquidity within the selected range.

tooltips.averageLiquidity: Average of daily liquidity values within the selected range: avg(liquidity[day]). Source: raydiumPool (daily).
tooltips.liquidityRange: Min and max of daily liquidity within range: min(liq), max(liq). The span is max−min. Source: raydiumPool (daily).
tooltips.aprAverage: Average of daily APR values in range: avg(APR[day]). Source: raydiumPool (daily).
tooltips.dailyVolatility: Volatility of liquidity as stdev of daily returns: stdev((L_t−L_{t−1})/L_{t−1})×100. Lower = more stable.
tooltips.trends: APR trend compares recent vs prior 7-day averages to label Rising/Stable/Falling. Health grade is a composite of liquidity, APR, and stability.
tooltips.aprTrend: APR Trend indicates whether APR is rising, stable, or falling based on comparing recent vs prior period averages.
tooltips.healthGrade: Health Grade summarizes pool condition from multiple factors (liquidity depth, APR level/stability).
tooltips.keyMetrics: Supplementary metrics; shown only when derived reliably from DB. Values may be hidden if inputs are insufficient.
tooltips.aprP50: Median APR over the selected period (50th percentile). Half the days are below, half above.
tooltips.aprP75: 75th percentile APR: a level exceeded by the top 25% of days in the selected period.
tooltips.aprP90: 90th percentile APR: a high watermark exceeded by only 10% of days in the selected period.
tooltips.coverage: Data completeness: observed data points ÷ expected points for the timeframe. 100% means no missing days.
tooltips.completeness: Completeness considers unique days and includes live data for today when available. If only today's daily point is missing but live exists, coverage shows as 100%.
tooltips.aprStreak: Consecutive days APR increased or decreased last: direction and length are computed from daily APR changes.
tooltips.liquidityStreak: Consecutive days liquidity increased or decreased last: direction and length from daily liquidity changes.
tooltips.maxDrawdown: Largest peak-to-trough decline in the period: min((value/peak)−1)×100, reported in percent.
tooltips.distribution: Histogram of daily liquidity by fixed buckets; concentration metrics are shown only when statistically meaningful.
tooltips.gini: Gini coefficient computed from bucket distribution as inequality measure (0=even, 1=concentrated).
tooltips.top20Concentration: Cumulative share contributed by the top 20% buckets (by order): higher means more concentration.

analysis.title: Automated Analysis
analysis.comingSoon: More detailed analysis is coming soon.
analysis.feeAprNote: Estimated fee APR based on 0.25% of volume.
analysis.liquidityHealth: Liquidity appears {health} relative to recent range.
analysis.aprTrend: APR trend over selected period is {trend}.

tooltips.current: Current APR and Liquidity are the latest observed values from live or daily sources.
tooltips.apr: APR section summarizes average and range over the selected timeframe.
tooltips.health: Health summarizes a composite of liquidity, APR, and stability factors.
tooltips.position: Position compares current values to moving averages (MA7/MA30) and historical percentile rank.
tooltips.momentum: Momentum summarizes percentage of up days and average daily percent change.
tooltips.signals: Signals show whether APR is above key moving averages and the max drawdown in the period.

toast.refreshAgainIn: You can refresh again in {seconds} seconds
toast.allRaydiumDataUpdated: All Raydium data has been updated
